incorporacion_proyectos.titulo: Proposed Projects of Law to be Included in Congreso Virtual
incorporacion_proyectos.descripcion: Are there any project that are of your total interest, and that you would like to be incorporated into the Virtual Congress? If it reaches 100 support signatures, it will be added to the site, so that it can be voted and debated by the active community.

urgencias_proyectos.titulo: Proposed Projects of Law for Urgency Requests
urgencias_proyectos.descripcion: Is there any project, currently under debate in Congress, that you would like to be discussed here too? If you obtain 100 signatures, this will be incorporated into the table with a higher priority, so that it can be discussed quickly in Congress.

contenido.titulo: How do we incorporate a citizen consultation?

descripcion.parrafo1: Public consultations are virtual, non-binding, public and open participation mechanisms whereby the Chamber of Deputies or a commission consults the citizens about a bill or a matter of a legislative nature within their competence.
descripcion.parrafo2: Article 18. Citizen initiative. Any person or organization may request the conduct of a citizen consultation about a bill in process. The administrative unit in charge of citizen participation will inform the parliamentary committees or the respective commission if the project is based on it. The pronouncement on the request must be issued in the first session in which this is possible.

votacion_general.descripcion1: At this stage of the legislative process, you can vote and comment on the

popover.segundo: Its purpose is to approve or reject the discussion of a bill considering the fundamental aspects contained in the message or motion, and admit the indications submitted by the President of the Republic and the parliamentarians for processing.

votacion_particular.descripcion1: At this stage of the legislative process, you can vote and comment
votacion_particular.descripcion2: specific to the project of law

popover.segundo: It aims to examine the bill in detail and by articles.

contenido.parrafo1: Is there a bill that interests you and is not in the Virtual Congress? If so, select it and disseminate it to obtain votes and be considered.
contenido.parrafo2: Or if there is any project that you would like to have priority to be studied by the National Congress, look for it, select it and disseminate it to obtain support from other participants and that Congress ask the President of the Republic to put it urgently.

crear_proyecto.popover_fecha_inicio: Date and time of voting start. After the voting period no user (including administrators) can vote. NOTE: Enter the date and time according to your time zone, this will be automatically converted to UTC.
crear_proyecto.popover_fecha_termino: Date and time of voting end. After the voting period no user (including administrators) can vote. NOTE: Enter the date and time according to your time zone, this will be automatically converted to UTC.

etapa.popover: Voting in general: votes are allowed both for the project in general, and for its fundamental ideas. Voting in particular: votes are allowed both for the project in general, and for its fundamental articles and ideas. Voting closed: no votes are allowed for the project in general, fundamental ideas or articles (administrators may also vote for projects at this stage).

fuente_video.popover: External service where the video is hosted.

codigo_video.popover: Corresponds to the code, usually alphanumeric, that identifies the video and is part of the URL to access to view it.

crear_proyecto.suscritos: Do you want this project to be massively sent to users subscribed to the associated topics?
crear_proyecto.publico: Do you want this project to be shown publicly?
crear_proyecto.popover_publico: If it is public, it is visible to everyone, otherwise, non-administrator users will not be able to access it.
crear_proyecto.principal: Do you want this project to be prominent?
crear_proyecto.popover_principal: Which is marked as prominent, means that the project must be displayed on the first carousel of projects of law on the home page.
crear_proyecto.habilitado: Do you want this project to be enabled to be voted and commented?
crear_proyecto.popover_habilitado: It allows, at any time, to stop accepting comments and votes, even if the project is in stages that involve voting and within the deadlines to vote. NOTE: Administrators may also vote and comment on disabled projects.

analitica.descripcion_nube: A word cloud or tag cloud is a visual representation of the words that make up a text, where the size is larger for the words that appear more frequently.
analitica.grafico: In the following graphic you can visualize the different users and divided according to the place of origin.
analitica.siguiente: In the following graphic you can visualize the different users and divided according to the year in which they were created and their gender.
analitica.seccion: In the next section you can see a graphical analysis of the different votes made. Either in the general vote, as separated according to general ideas and articles.
